metadata.titleEn: Late Cretaceous Cenozoic exhumation in Yanji area: low temperature thermochronology data set
metadata.titleCn: 延吉地区晚白垩世-新生代低温热年代学数据集
metadata.description: This data is the fission track data, (U-Th - [SM]) / he apatite age, (U-Th) / he zircon age of granite. The samples are mainly collected from Phanerozoic granites in Tianfozhi mountain, southwest Yanji, Jilin Province, most of which are Jurassic granites, and a small number of Permian, Triassic and early Cretaceous granites. Apatite fission track ages are obtained by external detectors;（ U-Th - [SM]) / he apatite age and (U – th) / he zircon age were obtained by degassing apatite and zircon with 820 nm optical coupled  fiber-optically coupled diode laser and analyzed by inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS) ; The cooling history and exhumation history from Late Cretaceous to Cenozoic in Yanji area can be limited by the obtained data.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据为花岗岩的裂变径迹数据、(U-Th-[Sm])/He磷灰石年龄、 (U–Th)/He 锆石年龄。样品主要采集自吉林延吉西南地区天佛指山的显生宙花岗岩，其中大部分为侏罗纪花岗岩，也有少部分二叠纪、三叠纪以及早白垩世花岗岩。磷灰石裂变径迹年龄通过外部探测器方法来获得；(U-Th-[Sm])/He磷灰石年龄与(U–Th)/He 锆石年龄通过使用820nm光耦合半导体激光器脱气对磷灰石和锆石脱气，并用电感耦合等离子体质谱法分析获得；通过获得的数据可以对延吉地区晚白垩世到新生代的冷却史及折返史进行限定。
metadata.instructions:
File name: fission track ages are stored in the form of Excel table. The file names are "fission track data of the Yanji area. Xlsx", (U-Th - [SM]) he apatic ages "and" (U-Th) he Zircon Ages ", representing“Sampling points”, " fission track data "," U-Th - [SM]) / he apatite age "and" (U – th) / he zircon age ", respectively.
Data reading mode: the data can be directly opened by using the excel table
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名：裂变径迹年龄以EXCLE表格形式存储，文件的名称为“Sample details”“Fission-track data of the Yanji area.xlsx”，(U-Th-[Sm])He apatic ages“”和“(U-Th) He zircon ages”，分别代表"采样位置“ 、”“ 裂变径迹数据”、“(U-Th-[Sm])/He磷灰石年龄”以及“ (U–Th)/He 锆石年龄”。
数据读取方式：该数据可以直接使用EXCLE表格打开

background: Northeastern (NE) China is geologically located in the eastern segment of the Central Asian Orogenic Belt (CAOB), intersected in the Siberian Craton, North China Block (NCB) and Western Pacific Plate. NE China was formed by the continental margin accretion and continent–continent collisions. Since the Paleozoic, it has undergone the evolution of the Paleo-Asian Ocean, the Mongol-Okhotsk Sea and the circum-Pacific tectonic domain. The subduction of the Paleo-Asian Ocean from the early Paleozoic to the early Mesozoic forms the CAOB, then the Mongol-Okhotsk Ocean closed diachronously in a scissor-like fashion from west to east during the Middle Jurassic and the Early Cretaceous, signifying the completion of the accretion of the East Asian Continent, and finally, the NE China and the adjacent region has become part of the circum-Pacific tectonomagmatic belt since the Late Mesozoic. The Yanji area, located at the border of China, Russia, and Korea and about 100 km west of the Japan Sea, was considered as a part of the orogenic collage between NCB in the south and the Jiamusi-Khanka Massifs in the northeast. Consequently, the Yanji area is the most likely location where subduction-related magmatic activities and subsequent exhumation processes would occur. The Phanerozoic granitoids have been extensively exposed in the Yanji area, suggesting that the rocks overlying these granitoids have largely been removed. The total exhumation since the Late Cretaceous was on the kilometer scale.
research objective: We report, in this study, new low-temperature thermochronology of apatite and zircon data from the granitoid samples in the Yanji area, including 16 AFT ages and 7 track length data, 16 ZFT ages, 8 AHe ages and 3 ZHe ages, and integrate with 6 AFT ages, 6 track length data and 6 ZFT ages from Li et al. (2010). These data can help us to obtain a clearer insight into the late-stage cooling and inferred exhumation history of granitoids in the Yanji area, NE China, and to place this within the context of the regional tectonic history of the western margin of the Pacific plate. To better interpret the significance of our data, we modeled the data by HeFTy software to quantify the timing and amount of cooling at specific sites with eight apatite FT data, in combination with AHe data sets as far as possible.
methods: Twenty-two representative samples, in this study, were collected for FT and (U–Th–Sm)/He analyses from the Phanerozoic granitoids in the Yanji area. Especially eight samples were collected from the Tianfozhishan at * 100–200 m elevation intervals. The prepared samples were carefully ground and polished to an optical finish to expose internal grain surfaces. Then, apatite spontaneous fission tracks were revealed by 5.5 M HNO3 at 21 °C for 20 s, and zircon by a molten 8 g NaOH ? 11.5 g KOH eutectic at 220 °C for 20–60 h, as necessary to obtain a high-quality etch. AHe and ZHe thermochronology was performed at the University of Melbourne, Australia. Euhedral zircon and apatite crystals without fracture or U/Th-rich inclusion were handpicked for analysis. Grains with a diameter greater than 70 lm were preferred where possible in order to ensure helium gas values were optimal for measurement and to minimize the alpha ejection correction.
dataset: Twenty-two representative samples, in this study, were collected for FT and (U–Th–Sm)/He analyses from the Phanerozoic granitoids in the Yanji area. We report, in this study, new low-temperature thermochronology of apatite and zircon data from the granitoid samples in the Yanji area, including 16 AFT ages and 7 track length data, 16 ZFT ages, 8 AHe ages and 3 ZHe ages, and integrate with 6 AFT ages, 6 track length data and 6 ZFT ages from Li et al. (2010).
findings: The results show that the maximum exhumation is likely [ 3.0 km since the Late Cretaceous, and the current elevation is commonly a few 100 m in the Yanji area, which has been characterized by continental deposits since the Early Mesozoic, thus suggesting the occurrence of negligible surface uplift and total unroofing of at least [ 2 km since the Late Cretaceous. This study revealed the more details about the cooling and inferred exhumation, for example, differential uplift and denudation between the Oligocene-Early Miocene and the Middle Miocene, and proposed higher paleogeothermal gradient ([ 35 °C/km), reflecting exhumation of [ 3 km, probably less than of [ 5 km from Li et al. (2010).
backgroundCn: 东北（NE）中国地质上位于中亚造山带（CAOB）的东段，交汇于西伯利亚克拉通、华北块体（NCB）和西太平洋板块。东北中国是通过大陆边缘聚合和大陆-大陆碰撞形成的。自古生代以来，它经历了古亚洲洋、蒙古-鄂霍次克海和环太平洋构造域的演变。从早古生代到早中生代，古亚洲洋的俯冲形成了CAOB，然后蒙古-鄂霍次克洋在中侏罗纪和早白垩纪以剪刀状的方式从西到东逐渐闭合，标志着东亚大陆聚合的完成，最终，东北中国及其邻近地区自晚中生代以来成为环太平洋构造岩浆带的一部分。延吉地区位于中国、俄罗斯和韩国的交界处，距离日本海约100公里，被认为是南部华北块体与东北部佳木斯-韩卡块体之间的造山拼合体。因此，延吉地区最有可能是与俯冲相关的岩浆活动和随后的剥露过程发生的地点。延吉地区的显生宙花岗岩广泛暴露，表明覆盖这些花岗岩的岩石在很大程度上已被去除。自晚白垩纪以来的总剥露量达到了公里级。
research objectiveCn: 我们在本研究中报告了来自延吉地区花岗岩样品的新低温热年代学数据，包括16个AFT年龄和7个轨迹长度数据，16个ZFT年龄，8个AHe年龄和3个ZHe年龄，并与Li等（2010）提供的6个AFT年龄、6个轨迹长度数据和6个ZFT年龄进行了整合。这些数据有助于我们更清晰地了解延吉地区花岗岩的晚期冷却和推测的剥蚀历史，并将其置于太平洋板块西缘区域构造历史的背景中。为了更好地解释我们数据的意义，我们使用HeFTy软件对数据进行了建模，以量化特定地点的冷却时间和量，尽可能结合八个磷灰石FT数据和AHe数据集。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，从延吉地区的显生宙花岗岩中收集了22个代表性样本用于FT和(U–Th–Sm)/He分析。特别是从天佛指山以*100–200米的高度间隔收集了8个样本。准备好的样本经过仔细研磨和抛光，以达到光学平整，暴露内部晶粒表面。然后，采用5.5 M HNO3在21°C下处理20秒，揭示磷灰石自发裂变轨迹；对于锆石，则使用220°C下熔融的8克NaOH和11.5克KOH共晶，处理20–60小时，以获得高质量的蚀刻。AHe和ZHe热年代学在澳大利亚墨尔本大学进行。手工挑选没有裂缝或富含U/Th包裹体的欧式锆石和磷灰石晶体进行分析。尽可能优先选择直径大于70微米的晶体，以确保氦气值在测量时最佳，并最小化阿尔法排放修正。
datasetCn: 本研究从延吉地区的显生宙花岗岩中收集了22个代表性样本进行FT和(U–Th–Sm)/He分析。我们在本研究中报告了延吉地区花岗岩样本的新低温热年代学，包括16个AFT年龄和7个轨迹长度数据，16个ZFT年龄，8个AHe年龄和3个ZHe年龄，并与Li等（2010）提供的6个AFT年龄、6个轨迹长度数据和6个ZFT年龄进行了整合。
findingsCn: 结果显示，自晚白垩世以来，最大剥蚀可能为3.0公里，而在延吉地区，目前的海拔通常为几百米，该地区自早中生代以来以大陆沉积物为特征，因此表明自晚白垩世以来表面抬升几乎可以忽略不计，总剥蚀至少为2公里。本研究揭示了关于冷却和推断剥蚀的更多细节，例如在渐新世-早中新世与中中新世之间的差异性抬升和剥蚀，并提出了较高的古地热梯度（约35°C/km），反映出剥蚀约为3公里，可能少于李等（2010）提出的5公里。

Verification.QuestionEn: Can the (U–Th–Sm)/He thermochronology method be effectively used to analyze apatite and zircon samples from Phanerozoic granitoids?
Verification.QuestionCn: (U–Th–Sm)/He 热年代学方法能否有效用于分析来自显生宙花岗岩的磷灰石和锆石样品？

Verification.QuestionEn: Do the apatite and zircon data from the Yanji area provide insight into the late-stage cooling and inferred exhumation history of granitoids?
Verification.QuestionCn: 延吉地区的磷灰石和锆石数据是否提供了对花岗岩晚期冷却和推测的剥蚀历史的见解？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the external detector method used to obtain apatite fission track ages in the data collection process?
Verification.QuestionCn: 外部探测器方法是否用于在数据收集过程中获得磷灰石裂变轨迹年龄？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the data collection methods used for obtaining low-temperature thermochronology data from granitoid samples in the Yanji area?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在延吉地区获取花岗岩样品的低温热年代学数据所使用的数据收集方法有哪些？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the representative samples for the thermochronological data collected in the context of the Yanji area's geological studies?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在延吉地区地质研究中收集的热年代学数据的代表性样本在哪里？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to determine (U-Th-[Sm])/He ages for apatite and zircon in low-temperature thermochronology?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于确定低温热年代学中磷灰石和锆石的（U-Th-[Sm])/He年龄的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method involves using an 820nm light-coupled semiconductor laser for degassing apatite and zircon, followed by analysis with inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry to determine (U-Th-[Sm])/He ages.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法涉及使用820nm光耦合半导体激光对磷灰石和锆石进行脱气，随后通过电感耦合等离子体质谱法分析以确定（U-Th-[Sm])/He年龄。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a dataset that includes thermochronological data from Phanerozoic granitoids in a specific region?
Example.QuestionCn: 一个包含特定区域中寒武纪至现今花岗岩热年代学数据的数据集的例子是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a dataset includes low-temperature thermochronology data from the Yanji area, NE China, consisting of 16 AFT ages and 7 track length data, 16 ZFT ages, 8 AHe ages, and 3 ZHe ages, along with integrated data from previous studies.
Example.AnswerCn: 这样的数据集的一个例子包括来自中国东北延吉地区的低温热年代学数据，包含16个AFT年龄和7个轨迹长度数据，16个ZFT年龄，8个AHe年龄，以及3个ZHe年龄，此外还有来自先前研究的综合数据。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the defining characteristics of low-temperature thermochronology datasets related to granitoid samples?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与花岗岩样品相关的低温热年代学数据集的定义特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: fission track ages, track length data, (U-Th-[Sm])/He ages, external detector methods, helium analysis through laser de-gassing, mass spectrometry
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 裂变径迹年龄、径迹长度数据、（U-Th-[Sm])/He 年龄、外部探测器方法、通过激光脱气进行氦分析、质谱分析

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many samples were collected for the FT and (U–Th–Sm)/He analyses in a dataset from the Phanerozoic granitoids in the Yanji area?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在延吉地区的古生代花岗岩数据集中，FT和(U–Th–Sm)/He分析共收集了多少个样本？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the total number of low-temperature thermochronology data points obtained from apatite and zircon in a dataset from the Yanji area?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在延吉地区的数据集中，从磷灰石和锆石获得的低温热年代学数据点的总数是多少？
Quantification.AnswerEn: 16 AFT ages, 7 track length data, 16 ZFT ages, 8 AHe ages, 3 ZHe ages, 6 AFT ages, 6 track length data, 6 ZFT ages
Quantification.AnswerCn: 16个AFT年龄，7个径迹长度数据，16个ZFT年龄，8个AHe年龄，3个ZHe年龄，6个AFT年龄，6个径迹长度数据，6个ZFT年龄

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many samples were specifically collected from the Tianfozhishan region at various elevation intervals for a dataset?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在不同海拔区间，从天佛指山地区具体收集了多少样本用于数据集？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'low-temperature thermochronology' mean in the context of geological studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: “低温热年代学”在地质研究中的意义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Low-temperature thermochronology refers to the study of the thermal history of rocks, specifically the temperature changes they have undergone over time. In geological studies, it involves analyzing mineral samples, such as apatite and zircon, to determine the timing and rate of cooling, which can provide insights into the exhumation and tectonic history of a region.
Definition.AnswerCn: 低温热年代学是指研究岩石的热历史，特别是它们随时间经历的温度变化。在地质研究中，它涉及分析矿物样本，如磷灰石和锆石，以确定冷却的时间和速率，这可以提供有关一个地区的剥蚀和构造历史的见解。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods for apatite fission track analysis compare to those for (U-Th-[Sm])/He thermochronology in terms of sample preparation and analytical procedures?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在样品准备和分析程序方面，磷灰石裂变轨迹分析的数据收集方法与（铀-钍-[锶]）/氦热年代学的方法相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Apatite fission track analysis involves revealing spontaneous fission tracks by etching with 5.5 M HNO3 at 21°C for 20 seconds, whereas (U-Th-[Sm])/He thermochronology requires careful handpicking of euhedral crystals without fractures or U/Th-rich inclusions, with a preference for grains greater than 70 micrometers in diameter to ensure optimal helium gas measurement.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 磷灰石裂变轨迹分析涉及通过在21°C下用5.5 M HNO3蚀刻20秒来揭示自发裂变轨迹，而（U-Th-[Sm])/He热年代学则需要仔细挑选没有裂缝或富含U/Th的包裹体的欧几里得晶体，优选直径大于70微米的晶粒，以确保最佳的氦气测量。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in dataset composition between apatite fission track ages and zircon fission track ages collected from the Yanji area's granitoid samples?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在延吉地区花岗岩样本中，磷灰石裂变径迹年龄和锆石裂变径迹年龄的数据库组成有什么不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The dataset for apatite fission track ages includes 16 AFT ages and 7 track length data, while zircon fission track ages comprise 16 ZFT ages. Additionally, the dataset integrates 6 AFT ages and 6 track length data along with 6 ZFT ages from previous research.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 该数据集包含16个磷灰石裂变轨迹年龄（AFT年龄）和7个轨迹长度数据，同时锆石裂变轨迹年龄（ZFT年龄）包括16个。此外，该数据集还整合了来自先前研究的6个AFT年龄、6个轨迹长度数据以及6个ZFT年龄。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In terms of inferred exhumation history, how do the findings from apatite thermochronology compare to those from zircon thermochronology in the Yanji area?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在推断的剥露历史方面，延吉地区的锆石热年代学与磷灰石热年代学的发现有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Findings from apatite thermochronology indicate a high paleogeothermal gradient and exhumation of more than 3 km, while zircon thermochronology supports these observations by revealing differential uplift and denudation patterns between the Oligocene-Early Miocene and the Middle Miocene, suggesting similar exhumation magnitudes.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 来自磷灰石热年代学的研究结果表明，古地热梯度较高，且剥蚀超过3公里，而锆石热年代学则通过揭示古新世-早中新世与中中新世之间的差异性隆起和剥蚀模式，支持了这些观察，表明相似的剥蚀幅度。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What interpretations can be drawn about the geological history of NE China from the integration of low-temperature thermochronology data of apatite and zircon in granitoid samples?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 通过整合花岗岩样品中锆石和磷灰石的低温热年代学数据，可以对东北中国的地质历史得出哪些解释？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of low-temperature thermochronology data of apatite and zircon in granitoid samples from NE China can shed light on the late-stage cooling and exhumation history of the region. These interpretations help place the geological history within the context of the regional tectonic evolution, particularly concerning the western margin of the Pacific plate.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 东北中国花岗岩样品中低温热年代学数据的整合可以揭示该地区晚期冷却和剥蚀历史。这些解释有助于将地质历史置于区域构造演化的背景下，特别是与太平洋板块西缘相关的演化。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways might the data patterns from FT and (U–Th–Sm)/He analyses contribute to understanding the absence of significant surface uplift in the Yanji area since the Late Cretaceous?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: FT和(U–Th–Sm)/He分析的数据模式在理解自晚白垩世以来延吉地区缺乏显著地表隆起方面可能会贡献哪些方式？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The data patterns from FT and (U–Th–Sm)/He analyses suggest minimal surface uplift and a total unroofing of at least 2 km since the Late Cretaceous. These findings indicate that the region's elevation changes are primarily due to exhumation rather than surface uplift, providing insights into the geological processes that shaped the Yanji area.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: FT和(U–Th–Sm)/He分析的数据模式表明，自晚白垩世以来，表面抬升最小，总剥蚀至少达到2公里。这些发现表明，该地区的海拔变化主要是由于剥蚀而非表面抬升，为了解塑造延吉地区的地质过程提供了见解。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors influence the choice of low-temperature thermochronology methods, such as apatite and zircon data, in understanding the cooling and exhumation history of granitoids?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响低温热年代学方法（如磷灰石和锆石数据）选择的因素，包括理解花岗岩的冷却和剥蚀历史的因素。
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The choice of low-temperature thermochronology methods like apatite and zircon data in understanding the cooling and exhumation history is influenced by the need to obtain accurate ages and track length data from samples, which can provide insights into the late-stage cooling and inferred exhumation history. The geological context of the region and the characteristics of the granitoids, such as their exposure and history of magmatic activities, also play a critical role.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 低温热年代测定方法，如磷灰石和锆石数据，在理解冷却和剥露历史方面的选择受到获取样品的准确年龄和轨迹长度数据的需求影响，这些数据可以提供对晚期冷却和推断剥露历史的见解。该地区的地质背景以及花岗岩的特征，如其暴露情况和岩浆活动的历史，也起着关键作用。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the implications of integrating multiple datasets from different studies on the overall understanding of a region's exhumation and cooling history?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 整合来自不同研究的多个数据集对一个地区的剥蚀和冷却历史的整体理解有什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating multiple datasets from different studies, such as combining new thermochronology data with existing data, can provide a more detailed and nuanced understanding of a region's exhumation and cooling history. This approach allows for cross-validation and can reveal trends and patterns that might not be apparent in a single dataset, leading to a more robust interpretation of geological processes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 整合来自不同研究的多个数据集，例如将新的热年代学数据与现有数据结合，可以提供对一个地区的剥蚀和冷却历史更详细和更细致的理解。这种方法允许交叉验证，并且可以揭示在单一数据集中可能不明显的趋势和模式，从而导致对地质过程的更稳健解释。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of collecting low-temperature thermochronology data from apatite and zircon in the Yanji area?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在延吉地区收集磷灰石和锆石的低温热年代学数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The main goal is to obtain insights into the late-stage cooling and inferred exhumation history of granitoids in the Yanji area, NE China, and to understand this within the context of the regional tectonic history of the western margin of the Pacific plate.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是获取中国东北地区延吉地区花岗岩的晚期冷却和推断的抬升历史的见解，并在太平洋板块西缘的区域构造历史背景下理解这一点。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the steps involved in preparing samples for fission track and (U–Th–Sm)/He analyses in granitoid studies?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在花岗岩研究中，准备裂变轨迹和（U–Th–Sm）/He分析样品的步骤包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The prepared samples are carefully ground and polished to an optical finish to expose internal grain surfaces. Apatite spontaneous fission tracks are revealed by etching with 5.5 M HNO3 at 21 °C for 20 seconds, and zircon by a molten 8 g NaOH ? 11.5 g KOH eutectic at 220 °C for 20–60 hours, as necessary to obtain a high-quality etch.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 准备好的样品经过仔细研磨和抛光，以达到光学表面，暴露内部晶粒表面。通过在21°C下用5.5 M HNO3蚀刻20秒，可以显现出磷灰石的自发裂变轨迹，而锆石则通过在220°C下用8克NaOH和11.5克KOH的共熔物熔融蚀刻20至60小时，必要时以获得高质量的蚀刻效果。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is the helium gas measurement optimized in (U–Th–Sm)/He thermochronology analysis?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在（U–Th–Sm）/He热年代学分析中，氦气测量是如何优化的？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Euhedral zircon and apatite crystals without fracture or U/Th-rich inclusion are handpicked for analysis. Grains with a diameter greater than 70 micrometers are preferred where possible to ensure helium gas values are optimal for measurement and to minimize the alpha ejection correction.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 选择无裂缝或富含铀/钍包裹体的自形锆石和磷灰石晶体进行分析。优先选择直径大于70微米的颗粒，以确保氦气值在测量时最佳，并尽量减少阿尔法排放修正。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are followed to integrate AFT, ZFT, AHe, and ZHe data for thermochronological modeling in geological studies?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn:
在地质研究中，整合AFT、ZFT、AHe和ZHe数据以进行热年代学建模的程序步骤如下：

1. 数据收集：收集AFT（铀-钍-氦）、ZFT（锆石裂变径迹）、AHe（铝-氦）和ZHe（锆石-氦）样本的实验数据。

2. 数据整理：对收集到的数据进行整理，包括样本的地质背景、采样位置、矿物成分等信息。

3. 数据校正：对实验数据进行校正，以消除可能的系统误差和实验误差，确保数据的准确性。

4. 热历史重建：利用整合的数据，应用热历史模型（如HeFTy或QTQt）重建样本的热历史，确定其温度-时间路径。

5. 模型验证：通过与其他地质证据（如地层学、构造分析等）进行对比，验证热历史模型的合理性。

6. 结果分析：分析整合后的热年代学数据，探讨其对区域地质演化、构造活动和热事件的意义。

7. 报告撰写：将研究结果整理成报告或论文，分享给学术界和相关领域的研究人员。
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data is modeled using HeFTy software to quantify the timing and amount of cooling at specific sites. This involves integrating eight apatite FT data with AHe data sets, as far as possible, to interpret the significance of the data in terms of the cooling and inferred exhumation history.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 这些数据使用HeFTy软件建模，以量化特定地点的冷却时间和量。此过程涉及将八个磷灰石FT数据与AHe数据集尽可能整合，以解释数据在冷却和推断的剥蚀历史方面的意义。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data collection methods enable the acquisition of low-temperature thermochronology data from granitoid samples in geological studies?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据收集方法能够从花岗岩样本中获取低温热年代学数据，以用于地质研究？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The collection of low-temperature thermochronology data from granitoid samples is enabled by fission track (FT) and (U–Th–Sm)/He analyses. Representative samples are collected from the field, carefully ground, and polished to expose internal grain surfaces. Apatite and zircon crystals are etched to reveal spontaneous fission tracks and analyzed using methods like AHe and ZHe thermochronology, which are performed at specialized facilities like the University of Melbourne.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 低温热年代学数据的收集通过裂变径迹（FT）和（U–Th–Sm）/He分析来实现。代表性样品从野外采集，经过仔细研磨和抛光以暴露内部晶粒表面。磷灰石和锆石晶体被蚀刻以揭示自发裂变径迹，并使用像AHe和ZHe热年代学等方法进行分析，这些分析在墨尔本大学等专业设施中进行。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do technological advancements in etching techniques contribute to the accurate measurement of apatite and zircon fission tracks in geological samples?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 技术进步在刻蚀技术方面如何促进地质样品中磷灰石和锆石裂变轨迹的准确测量？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Technological advancements in etching techniques, such as using 5.5 M HNO3 for apatite and a molten NaOH-KOH eutectic for zircon, allow for the precise revelation of spontaneous fission tracks. These methods ensure high-quality etching necessary for accurate measurements, contributing to the reliability of geological studies focusing on thermochronology and exhumation history.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 技术进步在刻蚀技术方面，例如使用5.5 M HNO3处理磷灰石和熔融的NaOH-KOH共晶处理锆，能够精确揭示自发裂变轨迹。这些方法确保了高质量的刻蚀，必要时用于准确测量，从而有助于地质研究中热年代学和剥蚀历史的可靠性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: In what ways do sample selection criteria enhance the quality and reliability of thermochronology data in geological research?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 样本选择标准如何提高地质研究中热年代学数据的质量和可靠性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Sample selection criteria enhance data quality by prioritizing euhedral zircon and apatite crystals without fractures or U/Th-rich inclusions. Grains with diameters greater than 70 micrometers are preferred to optimize helium gas measurements and minimize alpha ejection corrections. This meticulous selection process ensures the reliability and accuracy of the thermochronology data obtained.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 样本选择标准通过优先选择无裂缝或富含铀/钍包裹体的欧hedral锆石和磷灰石晶体来提高数据质量。优先选择直径大于70微米的晶体，以优化氦气测量并最小化α排放修正。这个细致的选择过程确保了获得的热年代学数据的可靠性和准确性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the expected exhumation levels differ from the observed levels in similar geological settings?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 预期的掘出水平与相似地质环境中观察到的水平可能存在差异的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The results show significant exhumation and negligible surface uplift in the Yanji area, suggesting that differential uplift and denudation patterns, as well as variations in paleogeothermal gradients, could result in differing exhumation levels in similar geological settings.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 结果显示，延吉地区存在显著的剥蚀和微不足道的地表抬升，这表明差异性的抬升和剥蚀模式，以及古地热梯度的变化，可能导致在相似地质环境中出现不同的剥蚀水平。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the potential reasons for discrepancies in expected versus observed cooling rates when analyzing granitoid samples?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在分析花岗岩样本时，预期与观察到的冷却速率之间的差异可能的原因有哪些？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The study utilized low-temperature thermochronology to model the cooling and exhumation history of granitoids, which may vary due to factors such as differential uplift, denudation rates, or changes in geothermal gradients over time.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 该研究利用低温热年代学来模拟花岗岩的冷却和剥蚀历史，这可能由于差异性抬升、剥蚀速率或随时间变化的地热梯度等因素而有所不同。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might anticipated data from similar granitoid formations not align with the data collected from the Yanji area?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么来自类似花岗岩形成的预期数据可能与从延吉地区收集的数据不一致？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The Yanji area's unique geological history, including its position within the orogenic collage and its specific tectonic activities, could lead to distinct data outcomes that may not align with those from other granitoid formations.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 延吉地区独特的地质历史，包括其在造山带中的位置和特定的构造活动，可能导致与其他花岗岩形成不同的数据结果。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your assessment of the current datasets' ability to model cooling and exhumation histories effectively, and how might future datasets be improved in this field?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对当前数据集在有效建模冷却和剥蚀历史方面的能力的评估，以及未来数据集在该领域如何改进的建议。
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Current datasets, comprising AFT, ZFT, AHe, and ZHe ages, effectively model cooling and exhumation histories, providing valuable insights into regional tectonic activities. However, future datasets could be improved by expanding sample coverage and integrating additional thermochronological techniques to enhance spatial and temporal resolution, thereby providing a more comprehensive understanding of geological processes.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 当前的数据集，包括AFT、ZFT、AHe和ZHe年龄，有效地模拟了冷却和剥露历史，为区域构造活动提供了宝贵的见解。然而，未来的数据集可以通过扩大样本覆盖范围和整合其他热年代学技术来改进，以增强空间和时间分辨率，从而提供对地质过程更全面的理解。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how data from thermochronological techniques can accurately reflect the cooling and exhumation history of geological samples.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解热年代学技术的数据如何准确反映地质样本的冷却和剥蚀历史。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The dataset includes low-temperature thermochronology of apatite and zircon data, which helps in obtaining insights into the late-stage cooling and inferred exhumation history. Techniques like fission track analysis and (U–Th–Sm)/He dating are used to study the cooling history of rocks which can be correlated with exhumation processes.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 该数据集包括磷灰石和锆石的低温热年代学数据，有助于获取晚期冷却和推断的剥蚀历史的见解。使用裂变径迹分析和（铀-钍-锶）/氦定年等技术来研究岩石的冷却历史，这可以与剥蚀过程相关联。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how representative samples are selected for thermochronology studies in the context of geological research.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白在地质研究中，热年代学研究是如何选择代表性样本的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: In the context of the dataset, twenty-two representative samples were collected from Phanerozoic granitoids in the Yanji area. Special consideration was given to collecting samples from specific elevation intervals and ensuring that the samples were representative of the geological features under study.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在研究数据集的背景下，从延吉地区的显生宙花岗岩中收集了二十二个代表性样本。特别考虑了从特定海拔区间收集样本，并确保样本能够代表所研究的地质特征。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate potential datasets that could complement the existing thermochronology data from the Yanji area and enhance the understanding of the region's tectonic history.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查可能补充延吉地区现有热年代学数据的数据集，以增强对该地区构造历史的理解。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets could include additional geochemical data, seismic profiles, and paleomagnetic records from the Yanji area. These datasets could provide complementary insights into the tectonic processes and help validate the cooling and exhumation history inferred from thermochronology data.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的数据集可以包括来自延吉地区的额外地球化学数据、地震剖面和古磁记录。这些数据集可以提供对构造过程的补充见解，并帮助验证从热年代学数据推断的冷却和剥露历史。
